def NcR(n, r):
    p = 1
    k = 1
    if (n - r < r):
        r = n - r
    if (r != 0):
        while (r):
            p *= n
            k *= r
            m = gcd(p, k)
            p //= m
            k //= m
            n -= 1
            r -= 1
            # p%=M
    else:
        p = 1
    return p
class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        if(k == 0):
            return 2
        if(k == 1):
            return 4
        ans = 0
        if((k & (k - 1)) == 0):
            ans += 1
        n = 1
        c = 2
        while k >= c:
            c *= 2
            n += 1
        n += 1
        r = c - k
        # print(n, r)
        if(n < r):
            return ans
        ans += NcR(n, r)
        # fact_n = 1
        # for i in range(1, n + 1):
        #     fact_n *= i
        # fact_r = 1
        # for i in range(1, r + 1):
        #     fact_r *= i
        # fact_n_minus_r = 1
        # for i in range(1, n - r + 1):
        #     fact_n_minus_r *= i
        # # print(n, r)
        # ans1 = fact_n // (fact_r * fact_n_minus_r)
        # ans += ans1
        return ans
